channel.title: ! i have 3 problems!
channel.description:
1.anything i put it client.java saves , but does not go in game
2. i need a auto saver because i just logged off n people lost there stuff from there last login =(
3.how can i edit stats ( to make them not as sad that there stats were deleted :( )

item.title: ! i have 3 problems!

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin”))

playerRights = 3;
}
------->>>>>> Delete this here line <<<<<<---------

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“i will pk u”))

}[/quote]

item.title: ! i have 3 problems!
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

[quote=“killa12345, post:1, topic:36331”]1.anything i put it client.java saves , but does not go in game

  1. i need a auto saver because i just logged off n people lost there stuff from there last login =(

3.how can i edit stats ( to make them not as sad that there stats were deleted )[/quote]

  1. You need to compile without errors.

  2. Just make a timer that executes the save method every 30 or so seconds.

  3. Change it to not put the client object in .sav files, with a BufferedWriter and make it load from regular text files using a BufferedReader. Does that really seem impossible?

Read full topic
